bilingual.source: I used to see the stars clearly.
bilingual.target: 我以前能清楚地看到星星。

bilingual.source: Check. Did you introduce the person clearly?
bilingual.target: 检查。你清楚地介绍这个人了吗？

bilingual.source: List the problems and suggested solutions clearly.
bilingual.target: 清楚地列出问题和建议的解决方案。

bilingual.source: In paragraph one, say what you are explaining about clearly.
bilingual.target: 在第一段中，清楚地说明你在解释什么。

bilingual.source: The crowd's excitement is clearly felt when you look at this photo.
bilingual.target: 当你看这张照片时，可以清楚地感受到人群的兴奋。

bilingual.source: I clearly distinguished objects at a distance of a hundred and fifty yards.
bilingual.target: 我清楚地辨认出一百五十码远的物体。
请清楚地拼写你的名字。
我清楚地记得那个日子。
这个标志清楚地写着“禁止吐痰”。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, of course you are. Look at the organizational chart. You're clearly listed as founder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然是你负责啊，快看看上面的组织机构吧，你被清楚地列为了奠基人。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, clearly I could have.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明显我可以的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, he clearly came to the wrong person.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那他显然找错了人。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell that to Stefan, who clearly needs no one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟斯特凡说吧，他显然是谁都不需要。

yingyinNormal.en: Clearly, you've never been to Sandals Paradise lsland.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显而易见地，你从未去过天体营渡假小岛。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's clearly a joke. This could easily be true.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那很明显的是个笑话，但是这个很有可能是真的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, Your Honor. Clearly, the State's Attorney is overreaching.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，法官阁下显然助理检查官太夸张了。

yingyinNormal.en: That's what Typhoid Mary said, and clearly, her friends buckled.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当年伤寒玛丽也这么说，显然 她朋友让步了所以都病了。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, Joey, Kathy is clearly not fulfilling your emotional needs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊凯西显然无法满足你的心灵。

yingyinNormal.en: So your parents have come all the way for you clearly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然你的父母为你长途跋涉到此。

yingyinNormal.en: Sure. We should see results. Wow. Clearly not the way to go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那当然，效果应该...显然不能这么做。

yingyinNormal.en: But it's been, like, seven years and clearly nothing bad has happened.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是都七年了，什么都没发生。

yingyinNormal.en: Take it. What? She's clearly an Emma. Oh honey, but you love that name.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿去吧。什么？她真的很适合叫艾玛。亲爱的，但你喜欢那个名字。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to seize every opportunity. I am seeing everything so clearly now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要把握每一个机会，现在的一切都变得好清晰。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Inspector, this is clearly a waste of time. And if there's nothing...
yingyinNormal.zh: 探长，这显然是在浪费时间，要是没别的...

yingyinNormal.en: Well, clearly, that vital piece of information is going to win us the war.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很明显那条最重要的信息会帮助我们赢得战争。

yingyinNormal.en: Exactly. But if you look at the satellite blowup, you can clearly see this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，但如果看看卫星地图，就能清楚的看到这个。

yingyinNormal.en: But clearly you're up to the task. Hey, wait a minute, this one isn't dirty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你全都想出来了，这不是脏话。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, it clearly just said, "Let me in. Ignore the blonde. She's a bitch."
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么啦，它明明在说"让我进来嘛，别理那个金发女，她是个坏女人"。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you think about that? Clearly you don't think that's a possible thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得呢？显然，你不认为是可能的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The newly revised Danish Fashion Ethical Charter <highlight>clearly</highlight> states: "We are aware of and take responsibility for the impact the fashion industry has on body ideals."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最新修订的《丹麦时尚道德章程》明确规定：“我们意识到时尚产业对身材标准的影响，并为此负责。”

examination_example.sentence: Principles are hard to be <highlight>clearly</highlight> expressed.
It can be <highlight>clearly</highlight> explained by their inborn tendency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可以用他们天生的倾向来清楚地解释。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Clearly</highlight> you try to comprehend, in the sense of identifying meanings for individual words and drawing on your implicit knowledge of English grammar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 显而易见，你会尝试去理解，而这种理解是建立在辨识单个单词的意思和调用你自身英语语法隐性知识的基础之上的。

examination_example.sentence: Readers of Happy Money are <highlight>clearly</highlight> a privileged lot, anxious about fulfilment, not hunger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《快乐消费》一书的读者显然是幸运的一群人，他们渴望的是得到满足感，而非为糊口操心。

sense_info_list.en: in a way that is easy to see or hear

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>clearly</highlight> aims to form children's identity through play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很明显，它的目的是通过玩耍来形成孩子的身份认同。

examination_example.sentence: The scientific evidence from countries like Australia, Canada and the USA <highlight>clearly</highlight> indicates a decline in the birds' numbers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自澳大利亚、加拿大和美国等国家的科学证据清楚地表明，这种鸟类的数量在下降。

examination_example.sentence: Brain scientists call this effect "asymmetric dominance" and it means that people gravitate toward the choice nearest a <highlight>clearly</highlight> inferior option.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大脑科学家称这种效应为“不对称优势”，这意味着人们倾向于最接近明显劣势的选择。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in a way that is easy to see or hear

examination_example.sentence: Let's state <highlight>clearly</highlight>: Einstein was a genius.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们明确地说：爱因斯坦是个天才。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>clearly</highlight> showed that while likability can lead to healthy adjustment, high status has just the opposite effect on us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这清楚地表明，讨人喜欢可以带给我们良好的适应能力，而高地位对我们的影响恰恰相反。

examination_example.sentence: The arts <highlight>clearly</highlight> have a pretty positive impact on physical and psychological health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术显然对身心健康有相当积极的影响。

examination_example.sentence: When Dennis Williams received a text that <highlight>clearly</highlight> wasn't intended for him, he did something necessary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当丹尼斯·威廉姆斯收到一条显然不是给他的短信时，他做了一些必要的事情。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
